binding.label: Gear Extension Mode%s
binding.script: var modes = ['FULLY', 'PARTIALLY']; return sprintf("\nCurrent mode: Deploy %s",modes[arg[0]]);

binding.label: Rear Hatch%s
binding.script: var modes = ['Press to OPEN', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Press to CLOSE', 'Press to CLOSE', 'Press to CLOSE']; return sprintf("\n %s",modes[(10*arg[0])]);

binding.label: Gear Extension Mode%s
binding.script: var modes = ['FULLY for ground clearance', 'PARTIALLY for cargo loading, or in flight sky-diving']; return sprintf("\nCurrent height: Deployed %s",modes[arg[0]]);

binding.label: Set Lift or Hover Power range at Minimum
Set Lift or Hover Power range to Maximum
Display Screen 2 Left%s
binding.script: var modes = ['OFF', 'ON']; return sprintf(" is %s\nClick to toggle power.\nAI and MP will appear sorted by distance.",modes[arg[0]]);

binding.label: Display Screen 2 Right%s
binding.script: var modes = ['OFF', 'ON']; return sprintf(" is %s\nClick to toggle power.\nDisplay AGL flight measurements.",modes[arg[0]]);

binding.label: Display Screen 3 Left%s
binding.script: var modes = ['OFF', 'ON']; return sprintf(" is %s\nClick to toggle power.\nDamage control station.",modes[arg[0]]);

binding.label: Display Screen 3 Right%s
binding.script: var modes = ['OFF', 'ON']; return sprintf(" is %s\nClick to toggle power.\nDisplay raw ground elevation variables.",modes[arg[0]]);

binding.label: Display Screen 4 Left%s
binding.script: var modes = ['OFF', 'ON']; return sprintf(" is %s\nClick to toggle power.",modes[arg[0]]);

binding.label: Display Screen 4 Right%s
binding.script: var modes = ['OFF', 'ON']; return sprintf(" is %s\nClick to toggle power.\nDisplay raw flight orientation and hover variables.",modes[arg[0]]);

binding.label: Display Screen 5 Right%s
binding.script: var modes = ['OFF', 'ON']; return sprintf(" is %s\nClick to toggle power.\nDisplay engine performance variables.",modes[arg[0]]);
